name: RIGHTECH
tag_list: recruiting, recruiter, telecommunications, telecom, enterprise-communications, das, lte, siemens, ericsson
overview:
RIGHTECH is a leading provider in contract staffing, outsourced staffing and training services to the Telecom & Technology industries

Our full suite of staffing services are designed to address virtually any hiring scenario that companies may face. Our core service offerings: contract staffing, contract-to-permanent, permanent placement, outsourced staffing services, payroll services and training services are custom-tailored to best fit the needs of your business. RIGHTECH can give clients unparalleled flexibility to workforce solutions that are best for their companies.
